content:
：#2021.4.23.0:00英诞##天使双英正片##喜劳三连！拜托各位小可爱啦！！！#

『One』

置身满目雪白下的孩子
Children in the snow
你早已从巨浪中脱身
You're out of the big waves
高天之鹰在永昼之国
Eagle in the sky
生命消逝之处
Where life goes
破开风雨
Break through the storm
破碎的灵魂即得永生
The broken soul will exist forever

『Two』

无人能背身面神
No one can turn his back on God
无人
No one
无人不沐神的光辉
There is no one but bathes in the glory of God
无人
No one

『Three 』

使你耳清
So that you can hear
使你目明
So that you can see
使你的迷惘消散一清
Make you no longer confused
抬起头来
hold up one's head
浸于莎士比亚文字中
Immersed in Shakespeare's words
醉于布里顿乐曲下的
Drunk in the music of Britton
孩子啊
Children

『Four 』

在此处驻足
Stop here
我的羔羊
My lamb
我知晓万物
I know everything
直至胎中
From before birth
直至末后
Until after death
你的罪过
Your sins
我将宽恕
I will forgive
请在颂歌中
In the ode, please
沐身于那光
Bathe in the light

『Five』

唱诗班奏响颂歌
The choir sang a hymn
吟唱穿透雾都的迷雾
Singing through the fog
赞颂晃响百米的钟楼
Praise the bell tower
遥望不止之处的神啊
God who looks beyond the distance
请醒来吧
Please wake up
请聆听吧
Please listen
请指引吧
Please guide me

『Six』
曾言
I said that before
曾见
I've seen it before
曾驻
I used to stay
曾望
I saw it before
迷雾萦绕
The mist lingers
红茶沁蜜
Black tea and honey
如今的光景
Today's situation
不变
unchanged
如今的圣光
Today's holy light
仍在
Still

『Seven』
而这迷惘尚存
And this confusion still exists
而这决定未做
The decision was not made
不必介怀
Don't worry
祂的光
The light of God
永在
Forever
亚瑟:白黑@魔法少女小白黑
罗莎:祈屿(原po)
📷:狗仔@
后期:小圣
